definition: to massage sb's back by pounding it lightly with one's fists
to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: Tired when my father will help father rubbing rubbing shoulders back.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸勞累時我會幫爸爸捶背揉肩。

sentences.english: Where's the robot to pat you on the back?
sentences.chinese: 幫你捶背的機器人哪去了？

sentences.english: Scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
sentences.chinese: 你給我捶背，我替你搔癢。

definition: to make a bed/to lay bedding
to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she defecates
to rub oneself down with a wet towel/to take a sponge bath
to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
to pick the edible part of vegetables
